price: Wancan ne dõmin lalle Allah Shi ne Gaskiya, kuma lalle ne shi Yake rãyar da matattu, kuma lalle Shi Mai ikon yi ne a kan kõme.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-annahu yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wa-annahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
